title: Battery drain from "Screen" Pixel3XL
content:
Hi all, new issue with battery drain on my device over past 3 weeks or so. Normally don't have to charge until I go to bed on a normal day but am getting to 50% by lunch time at the moment! 

Only thing I can see is an obtuse amount of percentage going into the screen - as per battery usage in settings. I've attached a pic. 

Anyone else had a similar issue or have any ideas on fixing it? I've tried resetting but no luck.
